While there’s still some time to go before November 28th, we’re already starting to see a healthy selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, Bose’s QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are on sale […]

items.title: Bring home Belkin’s 6-outlet Power Cube while it’s down at $16 (Save 27%)
items.summary:
Belkin 6-Outlet Power Cube

Buy for $16 (Reg. $22)

What we love

While there are certainly more capable power strips out there, they are often made by lesser-known brands if you want to beat this one on price. Today’s deal delivers Belkin’s cube-shaped power strip with three AC outlets and three USB-A ports for $16.

more…

items.title: Stuff some stockings (or your EDC) with official Apple 240W USB-C cables at the $18 Amazon low (38% off)
items.summary:
Outside of the AirTag that is currently sitting down at $18 Amazon all-time low, options for Apple stocking stuffers in the sub $20 range are relatively difficult to come by. While I would certainly appreciate another Apple tracker in my holiday sock this year, Apple fans can never really have too many official USB-C cables, and the latest 240W model has returned to the Amazon low at $18. 

more…

items.title: A lifetime of learning with Curiosity Stream for $150 (Reg. $400)
items.summary:
Some streaming platforms promise drama. Curiosity Stream promises dinosaurs, deep space, and the inside story of literally everything. For a one-time payment of $149.99, new users can gain lifetime access to its Standard Plan—a treasure chest of documentaries that feels like the internet’s brainiest corner got its own network.

more…

items.summary: Lambda's new raise was a solid beat over the amount that deal-watchers say it was hoping to hit.

items.title: Deep clean with Fanttik’s G9 Nano Spin Scrubber with USB-C charging for $30 (Save 21%)
items.summary:
Fanttik G9 Nano Cordless Spin Scrubber

Buy for $30 (Reg. $38)

Clip the on-page 21% off coupon.

What we love

When deep cleaning, a tool like this can really come in handy. Before motorized tools like this existed, a spare toothbrush would be about the best you could do. This unit takes that so much further with various attachments and USB-C charging in tow.

items.title: Microsoft tries to head off the “novel security risks” of Windows 11 AI agents
items.summary: Agents with read/write access to your files create big security, privacy issues.

items.title: Windows 11 Copilot AI hands-on: despite Microsoft wanting PCs to "understand you", the feature delivers inconsistent results and often slow, incorrect responses (Antonio G. Di Benedetto/The Verge)
items.summary:
Antonio G. Di Benedetto / The Verge:
Windows 11 Copilot AI hands-on: despite Microsoft wanting PCs to “understand you”, the feature delivers inconsistent results and often slow, incorrect responses  —  It's not hard to understand the AI future Microsoft is betting billions on — a world where computers understand what you're saying and do things for you.

items.title: Apple's N1 chipset in the iPhone 17 lineup delivers up to 40% higher median Wi-Fi download and upload speeds globally vs. the Broadcom-based iPhone 16 lineup (Luke Kehoe/Ookla)
items.summary:
Luke Kehoe / Ookla:
Apple's N1 chipset in the iPhone 17 lineup delivers up to 40% higher median Wi-Fi download and upload speeds globally vs. the Broadcom-based iPhone 16 lineup  —  New wireless silicon in the iPhone 17 family delivers material performance improvements over predecessors, pushing it ahead of many Android flagship devices in Wi-Fi.

With a built-in clip, compact design, and case that showcases the earbuds when closed, Skullcandy’s Dime 3 earbuds really stand out if you ask me. Usually sold for $30, this already-affordable pair of earbuds now costs 33% less.

items.title: Tested: Baseus Nomos NU1 Air Spacemate 12-in-1 dock streamlines your Mac setup and adds dual 4K display support [Deal]
items.summary:
A reliable docking station can drastically improve your workflow and elevate your workstation, especially if you’re using a laptop as your main machine with limited ports. There are plenty of docking stations on the market from various manufacturers, and we’re taking a closer look at one of the latest and most feature-packed options today from Baseus – the NU1 Air Spacemate 12-port docking station. It’s been front and center on my desk for the past few weeks, simplifying my setup and improving my daily workflow. This one definitely deserves a spot on your shortlist if you’re in the market for a new dock, and here’s everything you need to know before adding it to your setup.

more…

items.title: Monarch Tractor sued over tractors that were ‘unable to operate autonomously’
items.summary: Burks Tractor, a dealership located in Idaho, has sued Monarch for breach of contract and allegedly violating its warranty because the California-based startup's tractors were "unable to operate autonomously." The dealership also says the 10 tractors it purchased "continue to experience significant problems," and calls them "defective."

items.title: Apple’s custom Wi-Fi chip gives the iPhone 17 a notable boost, according to speed tests
items.summary: Ookla has found that Apple’s custom N1 networking chip that integrates the Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6, and Thread radios in the iPhone 17 family “delivers a clear step-change in real-world Wi-Fi performance” when compared to the Broadcom chip used in the iPhone 16 models. In North America, the iPhone 17 family also outperformed flagship Android […]

items.title: Estella’s top pet deals of the week: Early Black Friday offers, ROKU pet camera 45% off, dog ramp 35% off, more
items.summary:
That time has come again, it’s Estella’s top pet deals of the week! As we’re getting closer to Black Friday, the deals are amping up. See top deals from Amazon, Target, and Estella’s favorite brand Vital Essentials. Some of Estella’s must-have items are on sale now including the XIAZ Elevated Dog Bowl and the Zilch Foldable 2-1 Stairs + Ottoman, both are necessities for protecting our pups from injuries and keeping an aligned spine while eating and climbing.

items.title: Gerber’s Prybrid multi-tool with 8 functions and swappable utility blade drops to $15 (Reg. $30)
items.summary:
Gerber Gear Prybrid 8-in-1 Multi-Tool

Buy for $15 (Reg. $30)

What we love

Despite the compact size of this multi-tool, it packs quite a punch with 8 functions in tow. My favorite has got to be the utility blade that can be swapped out whenever the old one gets dull. You’ll also find a wire stripper, small flat driver, large flat driver, nail puller, pry bar, bottle opener, and more.

items.title: a16z leads $21M Series A into AI-native tax compliance software Sphere
items.summary: Sphere helps automate registration, calculation, filing, and remittance obligations for companies. “We help companies collect tax on customer transactions,” Nicholas Rudder said, explaining that companies have to collect tax on purchases and remit it to authorities each month or quarter.
